page.title: 09Alstonfield Houses/Amenities
page.content:
{Housing in Alstonefield} Some of the houses in Alstonefield are quite old. There are a lot of farm buildings, like cowsheds and haybarns. There is a large number of bed and breakfast houses and holiday cottages. There is a chapel, but it is being converted into a house. We have a village hall and the school is being converted into another village hall.
{Alstonefield Amenities} The residents in our area say the most important technological developments in the parish are having the public telephone, the public toilets, the bus to Ashbourne, electricity, mains water and farming equipment.
